short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designers, streamline your product sourcing with the DesignFiles Chrome Extension—no more copy/pasting required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clip images, descriptions, prices, SKUs, and more from any website in just a few clicks.

Save products directly to your project library and use them in mood boards, proposals, invoices, tear sheets, and more. You control what details clients see and what stays behind the scenes, giving you full creative freedom.

The best part: It’s all saved in your DesignFiles product library for reuse again and again.
